thread.title: Comfortable, well renovated, proper and nice hotel !
thread.title_full: Comfortable, well renovated, proper and nice hotel ! - Review of Hotel Jardin Le Brea, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: luxpeter
title: Comfortable, well renovated, proper and nice hotel !
text:
If you are looking for a nice hotel for a good price near to a Metro station and in a beautiful surrounding, this hotel is a good choice for you ! Staff is helpful, breakfast is good, rooms and bath rooms are beautiful - you will like it !
Room Tip: We had one room to the street, which was quiet and another room to the calm court. See more room tips
